page.title: 19PEBMARSH SPECIAL EVENTS
page.content: The{Flower show and fete}is organised by the Countryman's Club,the Church and the Village Hall Management Committee in July. The show is held in the school. The{Autumn Show,}held in the Village Hall in October,is also organised by the Countryman's Club. The Church holds a{Harvest Weekend} during September.A Harvest Supper and Harvest Festival Service are among the events organised. The Parish Council enters the village in {The Essex Best Kept Village {Competition}sponsored by the soft drink firm Britvic. The{Essex Grand Prix Cycle Race}comes through Pebmarsh in March. The schoolchildren of Pebmarsh go{ {Carol Singing}through the village in December.
